ranked_game.name: Ranked Game
ranked_game.desc: Should game results affect OpenSkill. Note that games with AI or games that are not balanced are always unranked.

allowuserwidgets.name: Allow Custom Widgets
allowuserwidgets.desc: Allow custom user widgets or disallow them

allowpausegameplay.name: Allow Commands While Paused
allowpausegameplay.desc: Allow giving unit commands while paused

maxunits.name: Max Units Per Player
maxunits.desc: Keep in mind there is an absolute limit of units, 32000, divided between each team. If you set this value higher than possible it will force itself down to the maximum it can be.

deathmode.name: Game End Mode
deathmode.desc: What it takes to eliminate a team

com.name: Kill all enemy Commanders
com.desc: When a team has no Commanders left, it loses

builders.name: Kill all Builders
builders.desc: When a team has no builders left, it loses

killall.name: Kill everything
killall.desc: Every last unit must be eliminated, no exceptions!

own_com.name: Player resign on Com death
own_com.desc: When player commander dies, you auto-resign.

draft_mode.name: Draft Spawn Order Mode
draft_mode.desc: Random/Captain/Skill/Fair based startPosType modes. Default: Random.

disabled.name: Disabled
disabled.desc: Disable draft mod. Fast-PC place first.

random.name: Random Order
random.desc: Players get to pick a start position with a delay in a random order.

captain.name: Captains First
captain.desc: Captain picks first, then everyone else in a random order.

fair.name: After full team has loaded
fair.desc: Everyone must join the game first - after that (+2sec delay) everyone can place.

teamcolors_anonymous_mode.name: Anonymous Mode
teamcolors_anonymous_mode.desc: Anonymize players by changing colors (based on chosen mode) and replacing names with question marks, making it harder to know who's who.

global.name: Shuffle Globally
global.desc: You can distinguish different players and everyone sees the same colors globally. Diplomacy is the same as usual except using colors instead of names (e.g. "Red, let's ally against Blue").

local.name: Shuffle Locally
local.desc: You can distinguish different players but everyone sees different colors locally. Diplomacy is harder but possible using positions (e.g. "Southeast, let's ally against Northeast").

disco.name: Shuffle Locally (Continiously)
disco.desc: Same as local shuffle, except that colors are reshuffled every 2 mins for extra spicyness.

allred.name: Everyone Is Red
allred.desc: You cannot distinguish different players, they all have the same color (red by default, can be changed in accessibility settings). Diplomacy is very hard.

unit_market.name: Unit Market
unit_market.desc: Allow players to trade units. (Select unit, press 'For Sale' in order window or say /sell_unit in chat to mark the unit for sale. Double-click to buy from allies. T2cons show up in shop window!)

transportenemy.name: Enemy Transporting
transportenemy.desc: Toggle which enemy units you can kidnap with an air transport

notcoms.name: All But Commanders
notcoms.desc: Only commanders are immune to napping

none.name: Disallow All
none.desc: No enemy units can be napped

teamffa_start_boxes_shuffle.name: Shuffle TeamFFA Start Boxes
teamffa_start_boxes_shuffle.desc: In TeamFFA games (more than 2 teams, excluding Raptors / Scavengers), start boxes will be randomly assigned to each team: team 1 might be assigned any start box rather than team 1 always being assigned start box 1.

fixedallies.name: Disabled Dynamic Alliances
fixedallies.desc: Disables the possibility of players to dynamically change alliances ingame

disablemapdamage.name: Disable Map Deformation
disablemapdamage.desc: Prevents the map shape from being changed by weapons

no_comtrans.name: T1 transports cant load commanders
no_comtrans.desc: Commanders will be too heavy for tech 1 transports to carry. (Tech 2 transports can still carry)

slow_comtrans.name: Slower Transported Commanders
slow_comtrans.desc: Transports carrying commanders are significantly slower, limiting offensive use and reactive mobility

unit_restrictions_noendgamelrpc.name: Disable Endgame Long Range Artilery (LRPC) structures (AKA lolcannons)
unit_restrictions_noendgamelrpc.desc: Disable Endgame Long Range Artilery (LRPC) structures (AKA lolcannons)

map_tidal.name: Tidal Strength
map_tidal.desc: Unchanged = map setting, low = 13e/sec, medium = 18e/sec, high = 23e/sec.

low.name: Low
low.desc: Set tidal incomes to 13 energy per second

medium.name: Medium
medium.desc: Set tidal incomes to 18 energy per second

high.name: High
high.desc: Set tidal incomes to 23 energy per second

critters.name: Animal amount
critters.desc: This multiplier will be applied on the amount of critters a map will end up with

ffa_wreckage.name: FFA Mode Wreckage
ffa_wreckage.desc: Killed players will blow up but leave wreckages

coop.name: Cooperative mode
coop.desc: Adds extra commanders to id-sharing teams, 1 com per player

initialbox.name: Initial Start Box
initialbox.desc: First wave spawns in raptor start box, following hives avoid players

alwaysbox.name: Always Start Box
alwaysbox.desc: Hives always spawn in raptor start box

raptor_endless.name: Endless Mode
raptor_endless.desc: When you kill the queen, the game doesn't end, but loops around at higher difficulty instead, infinitely.

raptor_queentimemult.name: Queen Hatching Time Multiplier
raptor_queentimemult.desc: (Range: 0.1 - 2). How quickly Queen Hatch goes from 0 to 100%

raptor_spawncountmult.name: Unit Spawn Per Wave Multiplier
raptor_spawncountmult.desc: (Range: 1 - 5). How many times more raptors will spawn per wave.

raptor_firstwavesboost.name: First Waves Size Boost
raptor_firstwavesboost.desc: (Range: 1 - 10). Intended to use with heavily modified settings. Makes first waves larger, the bigger the number the larger they are. Cools down within first few waves.

raptor_spawntimemult.name: Waves Amount Multiplier
raptor_spawntimemult.desc: (Range: 1 - 5). How often new waves will spawn. Bigger Number = More Waves

initialbox.name: Initial Start Box
initialbox.desc: First wave spawns in scav start box, following beacons avoid players

alwaysbox.name: Always Start Box
alwaysbox.desc: Beacons always spawn in scav start box

scav_endless.name: Endless Mode
scav_endless.desc: When you kill the boss, the game doesn't end, but loops around at higher difficulty instead, infinitely.

scav_bosstimemult.name: Boss Preparation Time Multiplier
scav_bosstimemult.desc: (Range: 0.1 - 2). How quickly Boss Anger goes from 0 to 100%.

scav_spawncountmult.name: Unit Spawn Per Wave Multiplier
scav_spawncountmult.desc: (Range: 1 - 5). How many times more scavs will spawn per wave.

scav_spawntimemult.name: Waves Amount Multiplier
scav_spawntimemult.desc: (Range: 1 - 5). How often new waves will spawn. Bigger Number = More Waves

experimentalextraunits.name: Extra Units Pack
experimentalextraunits.desc: Formerly known as Scavenger units. Addon pack of units for Armada and Cortex, including various "fun" units

map_waterlevel.name: Water Level
map_waterlevel.desc: Doesn't work if Map Deformation is disabled! <0 = Decrease water level, >0 = Increase water level

ruins.name: Ruins
ruins.desc: Remains of the battles once fought

evocom.name: Evolving Commanders Enabled
evocom.desc: Commanders evolve, gaining new weapons and abilities.

evocomlevelupmethod.name: Evolving Commanders: Leveling Method
evocomlevelupmethod.desc: Dynamic: Commanders evolve to keep up with the highest power player. Timed: Static Evolution Rate

evocomlevelcap.name: Evolving Commanders: Max Level
evocomlevelcap.desc: (Range 2 - 10) Changes the Evolving Commanders maximum level

evocomxpmultiplier.name: Evolving Commanders: Commander XP Multiplier - Does not affect leveling!
evocomxpmultiplier.desc: (Range 0.1 - 10) Changes the rate at which Evolving Commanders gain Experience.

evocomleveluprate.name: Evolving Commanders - Timed Only - Evolution Timer.
evocomleveluprate.desc: (Range 0.1 - 20 Minutes) Rate at which commanders will evolve if Timed method is selected.

comrespawn.name: Commander Respawning Enabled
comrespawn.desc: Commanders can build one Effigy. The first one is free and given for you at the start. When the commander dies, the Effigy is sacrificed in its place.

assistdronesbuildpowermultiplier.name: Commander Drones: Buildpower Multiplier
assistdronesbuildpowermultiplier.desc: (Range 0.5 - 5). How much buildpower commander drones should have

assistdronescount.name: Commander Drones: Count
assistdronescount.desc: How many assist drones per commander should be spawned

assistdronesair.name: Commander Drones: Use Air Drones
assistdronesair.desc: Switch between aircraft drones and amphibious vehicle drones.

releasecandidates.name: Release Candidate Units
releasecandidates.desc: Adds additional units to the game which are being considered for mainline integration and are balanced, or in end tuning stages.  Currently adds Printer, Shockwave (Arm T2 EMP Mex), and Drone Carriers for armada and cortex

accuratelasers.name: Accurate Lasers
accuratelasers.desc: Removes inaccuracy vs moving units from all laser weapons as a proposed solution to overpowered scoutspam

emprework.name: EMP Rework
emprework.desc: EMP is changed to slow units movement and firerate, before eventually stunning.

junorework.name: Juno Rework
junorework.desc: Juno stuns certain units (such as radars and jammers) rather than magically deleting them

air_rework.name: Air Rework
air_rework.desc: Prototype version with more maneuverable, slower air units and more differentiation between them.

proposed_unit_reworks.name: Proposed Unit Reworks
proposed_unit_reworks.desc: Modoption used to test and balance unit reworks that are being considered for the base game.  Shuriken emp damage is reduced and Abductor emp damage and stuntime are reduced, but accuracy is increased.  EMP resist for units is standardized, and units that had low emp resists now take full emp damage.

energy_share_rework.name: Energy Share Rework
energy_share_rework.desc: Additional energy overflow/underflow mechanics. 10% of the energy income is re-distributed to prevent E-stalling.

lategame_rebalance.name: Lategame Rebalance
lategame_rebalance.desc: T2 defenses and anti-air is weaker, giving more time for late T2 strategies to be effective.  Early T3 unit prices increased. Increased price of calamity/ragnarock by 20% so late T3 has more time to be effective.

unified_maxslope.name: Standardized Land Unit Maxslope
unified_maxslope.desc: All land units have minimum maxslope of 36

faction_limiter.name: Team Faction Limiter
faction_limiter.desc: Limit which faction a team may play. Format; list factions, seperating teams by a comma, e.g. "armada cortex, legion" = cor/arm vs legion.

skyshift.name: Skyshift: Air Rework
skyshift.desc: A complete overhaul of air units and mechanics

forceallunits.name: Force Load All Units (For modders/devs)
forceallunits.desc: Load all UnitDefs even if ais or options for them aren't enabled

shareddynamicalliancevictory.name: Dynamic Ally Victory
shareddynamicalliancevictory.desc: Ingame alliance should count for game over condition.

defaultdecals.name: Default Decals
defaultdecals.desc: Use the default explosion decals instead of Decals GL4

teamcolors_icon_dev_mode.name: Icon Dev Mode
teamcolors_icon_dev_mode.desc: (Don't use in normal games) Forces teamcolors to be an specific one, for all teams

debugcommands.name: Debug Commands
debugcommands.desc: A pipe separated list of commands to execute at [gameframe]:luarules fightertest|100:forcequit...

animationcleanup.name: Animation Cleanup
animationcleanup.desc: Use animations from the BOSCleanup branch

startmetal.name: Starting Metal
startmetal.desc: (Range 0 - 10000). Determines amount of metal and metal storage that each player will start with

startmetalstorage.name: Starting Metal Storage
startmetalstorage.desc: (Range 1000 - 20000). Only works if it's higher than Starting metal. Determines amount of metal and metal storage that each player will start with

startenergy.name: Starting Energy
startenergy.desc: (Range 0 - 10000). Determines amount of energy and energy storage that each player will start with

startenergystorage.name: Starting Energy Storage
startenergystorage.desc: (Range 1000 - 20000). Only works if it's higher than Starting energy. Determines amount of energy and energy storage that each player will start with

multiplier_resourceincome.name: Overall Resource Income Multiplier
multiplier_resourceincome.desc: (Range 0.1 - 10). Stacks up with the three options below.

multiplier_energyconversion.name: Energy Conversion Efficiency Multiplier
multiplier_energyconversion.desc: (Range 0.1 - 2). lower means you get less metal per energy converted

tweakunits.name: Tweak Units
tweakunits.desc: For advanced users!!! A base64 encoded lua table of unit parameters to change.

tweakdefs.name: Tweak Defs
tweakdefs.desc: For advanced users!!! A base64 encoded snippet of code that modifies game definitions.
